1588180.name: Wild Isles
1588180.description:
Message with the developer, leave your game feedback, participate in contests & challenges, and stay up to date with Wild Isles news!


Each island is yours to discover. Stunning vista views, waves crashing on the shore, the wind in the leaves, the sun setting over the sea, the birds in flight. There are millions of procedurally-generated islands awaiting exploration.


Observe the lay-of-the-land and use your map & compass find different types of flowers. Peak's Petal on the highest points, Trail Thistle on the trail's edges, and Shorestalk on the sandy beaches... then journey there to find them!


Catch fireflies at night to light your way. Enjoy stargazing and watching aurora borealis dancing in the sky.


Use your spyglass to scout out far-off landscapes in search of what you seek.

Take a hike. Enjoy the journey.
